header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, at end insert “and spiritual wellbeing”
000: Clause 14, page 12, line 33, leave out from “18” to “by” in line 40
000: Clause 14, page 12, line 36, at end insert—

“( ) Services of an intimate nature can only be provided to the disabled person and not to meet a carer’s need for support; and regulations may make provision about what is, or is not, of an intimate nature for the purposes of subsection (3).”
000: Clause 14, page 12, line 39, leave out subsection (3)
000: Clause 20, page 17, line 22, leave out subsections (2) and (3)
000: After Clause 69, insert the following new Clause—
“Appeals on decisions for NHS continuing care
text.IndentOne: The Secretary of State shall make regulations setting out a system for appeal or review of decisions made about NHS continuing care, independent of the NHS, on a question of fact or law.”
